title: Sampler, mid–late 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered with withdrawn element work with needlemade fillings using looping and overcasting.  In top three bands elements have been removed in one direction (horizontal) only.
description:
Whitework sampler
Thirteen bands of withdrawn element work with needle-made fillings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, mid–late 16th century.
mid–late 16th century. Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered with withdrawn element work with needlemade fillings using looping and overcasting.  In top three bands elements have been removed in one direction (horizontal) only.. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-50.
